meanings.definition: To cook in an oven or over an open flame.
meanings.sent1: I will baken some cookies in the oven for the party.
meanings.sent2: She loves to baken bread on weekends for her family.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to baken a cake in the campfire for a change.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baken bread filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The baker baken a delicious pie that everyone enjoyed.

meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a cup of baken flour.
meanings.sent2: She added the baken ingredients to the mixing bowl.
meanings.sent3: The baken goods were displayed beautifully at the bakery.
meanings.sent4: The baken cookies were a hit at the school bake sale.
meanings.sent5: The smell of baken bread wafted through the house.
